description: Ooya Ichiko is a journalist and paparazza, with a tendency to write articles of a sensationalistic bent. After being relegated to the entertainment section of her newspaper after what should have been an article about a political scandal, she became depressed and cynical. She meets with Amamiya and the Phantom Thieves at several points, at first providing them with the tip that leads them to crime lord Kaneshiro.
name: Ooya Ichiko
